content: ## 3. Add an AI Agent Node The AI Agent node is the core of adding AI to your workflows. 1. Select the **Add node** ![Add node icon](/_images/try-it-out/add-node-small.png){.off-glb} connector on the trigger node to bring up the node search. 1. Start typing "AI" and choose the **AI agent** node to add it. 1. The editing view of the **AI agent** will now be displayed. 1. There are some fields which can be changed. As we're using the **Chat Trigger** node, the default setting for the source and specification of the prompt don't need to be changed.
